import React from "react"; import { Pane, Text, Button, Heading, Paragraph, TextInputField, FormField, Avatar, BackButton, CrossIcon, InfoSignIcon, EditIcon } from "evergreen-ui"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import background from "./Img/Stress.png"; function SeatInformationPage() { return (
{/* textDecoration has to set to none or else the button will have a line below the Login text */} {/* Parent class, defiines the row*/} {/* Children class, defiines the column*/} Seat #120 tint1 tint1 tint2 Description Password Reset

{/* This is the container/pane for the login section */} Forget Password? {/* textDecoration has to set to none or else the button will have a line below the Login text */}
); } export default SeatInformationPage;
